title: Shurima Art Contest top 10
body:
Hey everyone,

Thank you all for participating in our latest art contest. Hope you all enjoyed the prompt and the amazing artwork to come out of it!

Below are the top 10 most liked creations from our local community!

**Elin Tan - Taliyah**
https://fbcdn-sphotos-e-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xpf1/t31.0-8/13498045_688661747941918_5071011349972222219_o.jpg

**@Zduke_** (twitter)
https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/13522014_688661391275287_8215424615326204932_n.jpg?oh=bf61deab96bf93489f3493415f8a94e0&oe=5806DC7E

**@cjjayme** (Instagram)
https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/13445549_688661374608622_8108823301295498671_n.jpg?oh=77bde7b6d129e5fa0202879f751a91df&oe=5806865B

**Giriraj Tangkengko - Behold the deserts wrath**
https://fbcdn-sphotos-c-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xpa1/t31.0-8/13517680_688662144608545_7442998890146768403_o.jpg

**Joelin Tan - "Not yet time to die"**
https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/t31.0-8/13495374_688662021275224_3939555337181422450_o.jpg

**Mandy Powers - Onwards.**
https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/t31.0-8/13497632_688662504608509_5216283180185937628_o.jpg

**Vanessa Hung - ‘Azir carried Sivir's body to the Oasis of Dawn, a sacred pool once brimming with healing waters.’**
https://fbcdn-sphotos-e-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xpt1/t31.0-8/13475089_688663167941776_29196132527658519_o.jpg

**Veronica O'Neill - The Emperor's Way**
https://fbcdn-sphotos-g-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xpf1/t31.0-8/13483340_688663207941772_9093133770107073685_o.jpg

**Wasan Techawibulchai - "Azir lifted a hand, and an army of his elite warriors rose from the sands at the base of the Stairs of Ascension."**
https://fbcdn-sphotos-c-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xpt1/t31.0-8/13442667_688663251275101_6711802675158991309_o.jpg

**Zacharie Zhu - Goodbye Brother**
https://fbcdn-sphotos-a-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xtp1/t31.0-8/13482970_688663464608413_5581902271272639576_o.jpg

Congrats to all the winners! You should have an email from me to confirm prizing and summoner name. Prizes will be in your accounts by Wednesday this week.

Which one was your favourite? and what do you think our next art contest should look like?

replies.body: Ohhhh the one with {{champion:75}} and{{champion:58}} , right in the feels.
so much emotion in the artwork. Really awesome.
What happened to the shortlisted rewards, didn't they get sent through? I submitted my art and managed to get shortlisted, But I haven't recieved any message about rewards?
Which entry did you put through? We have reached out through email/twitter to obtain summoner name for prize out.
I was the "Surrounded By Kmiros" entry, and I never received the email. EDIT: Ive checked all the spam boxes for my emails and I didnt got a message yet

Hey, 

Just had a look through my history.

> Delivery to the following recipient failed permanently:
> 
>      Keiranwright13@gmail.com
> 
> Technical details of permanent failure:
> Google tried to deliver your message, but it was rejected by the server for the recipient domain gmail.com by gmail-smtp-in.l.google.com. [2607:f8b0:4003:c0d::1a].
> 
> The error that the other server returned was:
> 550-5.1.1 The email account that you tried to reach does not exist.

Are you able to send me an email Maraudaur@riotgames.com to confirm your actual email and then I will work to get prizing out to you asap.

oh awesome! congrats to the winners :)

so when/how will the winners/shortlisted entries recieve prizes and such?
We have reached out to each entrant through email or on instagram/twitter and obtained their summoner names by getting in touch.
These things are deserved it, cool stuff.
The amumu art, He's feet just makes amumu stand out so much :^)
